channel.title: Player Saving Error - PI
channel.description:
Ok so I'm trying to make a new int, like Dungpoints etc.. But this is what I get when I save my char
[IMG]http://screensnapr.com/e/5aKl7U.jpg[/img]
So this is my code:
Playersave.java [code] } else if (token.equals("onePoints")) { p.onePoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]
Also in Playersave.java
[code]characterfile.write("onePoints = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.onePoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.onePoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code]
Now in Player.java:
[code] public int onePoints;[/code]
Please can anybody help? I get no errors when I compile?
